name: FCPXTimeline
desc: An interface that has methods and properties to communicate and interact with the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var activeSequence: FCPXSequence?
items.desc: The sequence played in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var sequenceTimeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range of an active sequence in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: func add(FCPXTimelineObserver)
items.desc: Registers a workflow extension object as an observer for Final Cut Pro timeline changes.

items.name: func movePlayhead(to: CMTime) -> CMTime
items.desc: Sets the Final Cut Pro timeline playhead to a specified time.

items.name: func playheadTime() -> CMTime
items.desc: Returns the current playhead position in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: func remove(FCPXTimelineObserver)
items.desc: Stops an observer object from receiving notifications for changes in the Final Cut Pro timeline.
